translations: 遗弃物；被社会抛弃的人（derelict 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I had never seen so many derelicts in one place.
sentences.translation: 我从未在一个地方见到过这么多无家可归的人。

sentences.sentence: They choose to live like derelicts.
sentences.translation: 他们选择去过无业游民的生活。

sentences.sentence: In my vagabond years most derelicts seemed to be white.
sentences.translation: 在我流浪那些年，大多数被遗弃的男人好像都是白人。
